page.title: 03Transport
page.content:
Our town is 8 miles from {Malton} and 25 miles from {York} and 18 miles from {Scarborough}.We get a lot of military aircraft flying over our town from quite a few bases in and around { {North Yorkshire}. The nearest dock is in Scarborough. There are two main roads through Pickering. One is the { {A169}from Malton to{Whitby}and the second is the {A170}from {Thirsk}to Scarborough. Both cross at the Forest and Vale round-about.The A169 is a north-south road. The A170 is an east-west road.
Traffic Survey Today 27-6-85 we did a traffic survey at the school gate on Middleton Rd.On 3-7-85 we did another at the Forest and Vale round-about. The results are:-
